name: Bolt
title: bolt.new
payoff: Build full-stack web and mobile apps
shortDescription: Bolt is a development platform that enables users to prompt, run, edit, and deploy full-stack web and mobile applications. It's designed for developers and tech-savvy business professionals looking to quickly create and scale applications. An example use case is a startup rapidly prototyping a mobile app for e-commerce without extensive backend knowledge.
